title: Team Selected: Shows Previous, Current and Next Games on the Main Screen.
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the top section is visible
custom_expected:
Then the previous game
And the current game
And the next game will be visible

title: Team Selected: Top Section shows a total of seven games
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the top section is visible
custom_expected: Then a total of seven games will be visible by swiping left or right

title: Team Selected: Tapping Previous or Next game will update the main section to that particular game
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the top section is visible
And the main section is visible
custom_steps:
When a previous game is tapped
Or the next game is tapped
And the spinner has finished loading
custom_expected: Then the main section updates to that particular game

title: Team Selected: Main section displays appropriately depending on game state
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
custom_expected:
Then the preview screen will be shown if the game hasn't been played
And the linescore will be shown if the game is currently in progress
And the results will be shown if the game has entered a finalized state

title: Team Selected: Audio and WBC.TV buttons are visible when media state is set to "media_on" for a particular game
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
And the game selected has it's media state set to "media_on"
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV button will be visible

title: Team Selected: Gameday, Box Score and Video buttons on a game in the main section open correct sections when the game is in Final
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
And a game is displayed
custom_steps:
When we tap the Gameday Button
And we tap the Box Score Button
And we tap the Video Button
custom_expected: Then the appropriate sections will open successfully

title: Team Selected: Changing Time Zones displays Date/Times of games in the main section appropriately
custom_preconds:
Given that the devices time zone has been adjusted
And we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
And a game is displayed in the main section
custom_expected: Then all time zones display correctly in the main section (EST, CST, MT, MST & PST)

title: Team Selected: Team Page updates immediately when sending the application to the background and then bringing it back to the foreground
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the application is sent to the background
custom_expected: Then bringing the application to the foreground updates the team page immediately

title: Team Selected: Selecting the ticket icon on a game that hasn't been played yet will bring us to the tickets page of the home team
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
And the game hasn't been played yet
custom_expected: Then tapping on the ticket icon brings us to the ticket page of the home team

title: Team Selected: Innings are scrollable on a completed extra inning game in the linescore
custom_preconds:
Given that the device date is set to a day of an Extra Innings game
And we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
And the game is completed
custom_expected: Then we can scroll to all the innings in the linescore

title: Team Selected: Suspended games shows up appropriately in the main section
custom_preconds:
Given that the device date is set to a day of a Suspended game
And we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
custom_expected: Then the main section will display the suspended game appropriately.

title: Team Selected: Postponed games show up appropriately in the main section.
custom_preconds:
Given that the device date is set to a day of a Postponed game
And we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
custom_expected: Then the main section will display the postponed game appropriately.

title: Team Selected: Completed games display Home Team below the Away Team in the linescore
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
And a completed game is displayed
custom_expected: Then the home team will be below the away team in the linescore

title: Team Selected: Team Records show up in the Main Section for Completed games on Today's Date or Previous Dates
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
custom_expected:
Then if todays game has been completed & selected the team records will show up in the main section
And if previously picked games are selected the team records will show up in the main section

title: Team Selected: Active Game in main section refreshes according to refresh rate in settings
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And the main section is visible
And there is an active game
custom_expected: Then the main section will refresh according to the refresh rate in settings

title: Team Selected: Home team displayed after away teams
custom_preconds: Given there are games scheduled
custom_steps:
When the user opens the app
And goes to a team page
custom_expected:
Then the user will see:
- Game in preview in the main section the home team is on the right and the away team is on the left
- Game in progress/final in the date carousel will see the home team underneath the away team
- Game in progress/final in the main section in the line score the home team will be underneath the away team

title: Navigation: Setting a Team as a Favorite team and then selecting the Team's Logo on the Tab Bar brings us to that Team's Page
custom_preconds:
Given a Team has been set as a Favorite
And the Team's logo is on the Tab Bar
custom_expected: Then selecting the Team's Logo will bring us to the Team's Page

title: Scenario: User navigates to Team settings page
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and the user has selected a favorite team
and the user is on the favorite team's page via the button button at the bottom
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the More section from the Tab Bar
And the user taps the Teams list item
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to the team settings page where they will see options to add/edit the team as a favorite

title: Teams: Verify that when a game has been completed early that it's displayed as 'Final/n'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to a Team Home Page that has finished a game in the state of 'Completed Early'
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the game reflects as 'Final/n' instead of 'Completed Early'

title: Teams: Verify that if a "Favorite Team" is set that the "Teams" menu item is available under "More"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have set a "Favorite Team"
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the "More" Tab Bar item
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Teams" menu item is available

title: Teams: Verify that removing a Favorite team re-sorts the Tab Bar properly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic 
AND we have launched the Application 
AND we have a "Favorite Team" set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "More"
AND we navigate to "Teams"
AND we remove a Team as our "Favorite Team"
AND we back out of "Teams"
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the tab bar has resorted itself 
AND the tabs will appear in this order: Scoreboard, News, Videos, Schedule, More

title: Teams: Verify if we tap on a Team in the Teams menu that it will open the actual Teams page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classics
AND we have launched the Application
AND we don't have a Favorite Team set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to More
AND we tap on Teams
AND we tap on a Team
custom_expected: THEN that Team's page will successfully open

title: Team News: Appropriate Teams News displays
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And we have selected News
custom_expected:
Then appropriate teams news displays

REPEAT for each Team

title: Team News: Articles & Images display accurately and fit appropriately
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And we have selected News
custom_expected:
Then articles display accurately
And articles fit appropriately
And images display accurately
And images fit appropriately
And a default image displays for missing images

title: Highlights: TeamViewController -> VideoHighlightsViewController then back crashes
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigated to a team page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on Video Highlights
And then taps on the team name button while the highlights are loading
custom_expected:
Then the app will not crash
And will return users to the previous page as expected

title: Team Roster: Selecting Roster opens up corresponding teams roster
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
custom_steps: When we tap the Roster button
custom_expected:
Then roster opens up corresponding teams roster

REPEAT for each Team

title: Team Roster: Players are listed alphabetically in the Name section of the Roster
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And we have selected Roster
And we have selected Name
custom_expected: Then players are displayed in alphabetical order

title: Team Roster: Players are grouped appropriately in the Postion section of the Roster
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Teams menu
And we have selected a Team
And we have selected Roster
And we have selected Position
custom_expected: Then players are grouped by their appropriate position

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify that the Date Font when scrolling through the list remains constant
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Teams page
AND we tap on Schedule
AND we tap on the List button on the top
AND we scroll through the List View
custom_expected: THEN the Date Font will remain consistent

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify tapping on a game will open the appropriate Gameday
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed WBC
AND we have bought the Application
OR we have logged in with an Authorized Account
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Teams page
AND we tap on Schedule
AND we tap on the List button
AND we tap on a game
custom_expected: THEN the appropriate Gameday will open for that particular game

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify tapping on a game that hasn't been played yet will open up the Preview window for that game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have bought the Application
OR we have logged in with an Authorized Account
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Teams page
AND we tap on Schedule
AND we tap on the List button
AND we tap on a game that hasn't been played yet
custom_expected: THEN the Preview window will appear for that specific game

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify that a Month Index appears on the right and that selecting any of the months will bring up that month
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Teams page
AND we tap on Schedule
AND we tap on the List button
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that a Month Index appears on the right side of the screen
AND we will see that selecting any of the Months brings us to the appropriate Month

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify that if the Team has lost that the final results of the game reflect in Red
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Teams page
AND we tap on Schedule
AND we tap on the List button
AND there are games available where the Team in question has lost
custom_expected: THEN the final results of a game where the Team in question has lost will be reflected in Red

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify that if the Team has won that the final results of the game reflect in Black
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat 
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Teams page 
AND we tap on Schedule
AND we tap on the List button 
AND there are games available where the Team in question has won
custom_expected: THEN the final results of a game where the Team in question has won will be reflected in Black

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify that the Team Logos for each Team display correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Teams page
AND we tap on Schedule
AND we tap on he List button
AND we look at the Team Logo's being displayed
custom_expected: THEN the Team Logo's for each Team will be displayed correctly

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify that if a game is not in a final state that we do not see 'W' or 'L' next to the score
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'More'
AND we tap on 'Teams'
AND we tap on a 'Team'
AND we tap on 'Schedule'
AND we tap on 'List'
AND there is a game available that is not finalized yet
custom_expected:
THEN we will not see 'W' next to the Score for that game
AND we will not see 'L' next to the Score for that game

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify when a game has reached a finalized state that we will see the Winning / Losing pitcher if there was one
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'More'
AND we tap on 'Teams'
AND we tap on a 'Team'
AND we tap on 'Schedule'
AND we tap on the 'List' button
AND there are games available that have reached the state of finalized
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the game properly displays a 'Winning Pitcher'
AND we will see that the game properly displays a 'Losing Pitcher'

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify that when a game goes in progress that the probable pitchers no longer show in that games cell
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'More'
AND we tap on 'Teams'
AND we tap on a 'Team'
AND we tap on 'Schedule'
AND we tap on 'List'
AND there is a game available in the state of 'In Progress'
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the probable pitchers that were showing against that game do not show while the game is in a state of 'In Progress'

title: Team Schedule (List): Verify that the various states of Postponement show correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application

Game State URL: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/mobile/2012+MLB+Game+States
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'More'
AND we tap on 'Teams'
AND we tap on a 'Team'
And we tap on ' Schedule'
AND we tap on 'List'
AND we repeat this for each team that has a different game state of Postponement setup
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Postponed state reflects correctly in the List view
AND we will see that the Canceled state reflects correctly in the List view
AND we will see that the Forfeit state reflects correctly in the List view
AND we will see that the Suspended state reflects correctly in the List view
